typeSystemDescription.name: typeSystemDescriptor
typeSystemDescription.description: This typesystem only describes the input and output types of the CPE. You need to implement the types requried for your ranking model.

typeDescription.name: type.ComponentAnnotation
typeDescription.description: A parent annotation which expects individual annotation types to inherit from.

featureDescription.name: componentId
featureDescription.description: An identifier that specifies which system produced this annotation.

featureDescription.name: score
featureDescription.description: The ranking score acquired for the answer and the confidence score acquired for the question.

typeDescription.name: type.InputDocument
typeDescription.description: Stores all the questions and its associated answer candidates.

featureDescription.name: QASet
featureDescription.description: The QASet type feature for the InputDocument type

typeDescription.name: type.Question
typeDescription.description: Stores the information about a question.

featureDescription.name: id
featureDescription.description: The identifier for the question.

featureDescription.name: sentence
featureDescription.description: The text of the question.

featureDescription.name: passages
featureDescription.description: Passages associated with this question.

typeDescription.name: type.Passage
typeDescription.description: Stores the information of the passage.

featureDescription.name: label
featureDescription.description: This stores a gold standard label of this answer. 'True' means that it answers the question; otherwise, it is does not.

featureDescription.name: sourceDocId
featureDescription.description: This specifies the source document ID to which the passage belongs.

featureDescription.name: question
featureDescription.description: A question associated with this passage.

featureDescription.name: id
featureDescription.description: The ID that matches the question for which the passage is a candidate answer

featureDescription.name: reciprocalRank
featureDescription.description: The reciprocal rank of the passage in its QASet

featureDescription.name: toStringValue
featureDescription.description: Token as a string

typeDescription.name: type.QASet
typeDescription.description: Keeps track of which questions go with which answers

featureDescription.name: Question
featureDescription.description: The question in a QASet

featureDescription.name: PassageFSArray
featureDescription.description: An FSArray of the passages purporting to answer a question in a QASet

featureDescription.name: RankedPassageFSArray
featureDescription.description: The passages for each question, like in PassageFSArray, but ranked in descending order of score

featureDescription.name: size
featureDescription.description: The number of passages in a QASet; the size of the PassageFSArray and RankedPassageFSArray

featureDescription.name: precisionAt1
featureDescription.description: The precision at 1 for the passages in the QASet

featureDescription.name: precisionAt5
featureDescription.description: The precision at 5 of the passages in the QASet

featureDescription.name: reciprocalRank
featureDescription.description: The reciprocal rank of the first correct answer of the ranked passages in a QASet

featureDescription.name: averagePrecision
featureDescription.description: The average precision of the questions in a QASet

featureDescription.name: numCorrect
featureDescription.description: Number of passages for a question that are correct answers

featureDescription.name: TP
featureDescription.description: Number of true positives in the QASet

featureDescription.name: FP
featureDescription.description: Number of false positives in the QASet

featureDescription.name: TN
featureDescription.description: Number of true negatives in the QASet

featureDescription.name: FN
featureDescription.description: Number of false negatives in the QASet

featureDescription.name: rankThreshold
featureDescription.description: The threshold value for calculating TP, FP, TN, FN

featureDescription.name: precision
featureDescription.description: Precision over a QASet using rankThreshold and TP/FP/TN/FN

featureDescription.name: recall
featureDescription.description: Recall over a QASet using rankThreshold and TP/FP/TN/FN

featureDescription.name: accuracy
featureDescription.description: Accuracy over a QASet using rankThreshold and TP/FP/TN/FN

featureDescription.name: error
featureDescription.description: Error over a QASet using rankThreshold and TP/FP/TN/FN

featureDescription.name: F1
featureDescription.description: F1 score over a QASet using rankThreshold and TP/FP/TN/FN
